This is a guide to the code and software resources for the book _Value of Information for Health Economic Evaluations_ (eds. Heath, Jackson, Kunst).  The book is under development, and when published, these resources will be linked from here.

Chapters 1 and 2: no example code

For all: set current directory to

```system.file("Chemotherapy_Book",package="voi")```

or change commands in book to read files from this directory
